location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, at Muscat Cove to Francis Warden Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting that Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd, the Imam of Muscat, has accepted a British request to put an end to the slave trade in his lands. It notes that the Imam believes he will lose out politically and financially as a result; however, he considers it more important that the wishes of the British Government are attended to.
